column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Royal Railway Cambodia  informed people who are planning a trip from November 8th to 12th that the train will travel to provinces such as Takeo
column9: as well as have a box car for passengers who want to take their vehicles with them.------The following are the fare and the fare: ៖------Phnom Penh «« $ 5 »» Takeo------🎯 Phnom Penh «« $ 7 »» Kampot------🎯 Phnom Penh «« $ 8 »» Sihanoukville------🎯 Takeo «« $ 6 »»------Takeo «« $ 7 »» Sihanoukville------🎯 Kampot «« $ 5 »» Sihanoukville------🎯 Phnom Penh «« $ 4 »» Pursat------🎯 Phnom Penh «« $ 5 »» Battambang------🎯 Phnom Penh «« $ 6 »» Banteay Meanchey------តូច Small motor $ 5------🎯 Big bikes $ 10 and up or------$ 2 bikes------Royal Railway Cambodia Railway also said that there are two lines:------– First Line at 07.00 am from Phnom Penh »» Takeo »» Kampot »» Sihanoukville------– Second line 07:30 am From Phnom Penh »» Pursat »» Battambang »» Serey Sophorn------For more information or to book a ticket
